name: Miami Dice (Denys)
description:
Move the dice with keyboard arrows or W A S D

Adjust camera with mouse.

Try to kill all monsters with less turns as possible. After every move projectiles will came out in the direction of the arrows in the top face of the cube. Avoid the mines or the whole board will explode!

Credits: 

Victor Díaz :  Programming, Level Design,  Music&Sounds.

 Denys Almaral: Game Design, 3D/2D Art.
